Project.name: PureMVC MultiCore for Haxe 2
Project.Description: PureMVC is a lightweight framework for creating applications based upon the classic Model-View-Controller design meta-pattern. This is the specific implementation of the MultiCore version for the Haxe platform.
Project.ReleaseNotes:
Summary of Changes in 1.2
  • Libraries now include version number. - CLH
Summary of Changes in 1.1
  • Haxe 2.0 compatibility. This version is no longer compatible with older versions of Haxe.
Summary of Features in Version 1.0
  • First official release on PureMVC.org for Haxe.
  • Compatible with AS3 MultiCore reference version 1.0.5
Project.Installation:
Prerequisites
  • You must have Haxe 2 installed.
Installing the Project Source Code From the archive
  • Download the latest source code archive
  • Unzip the source code zip to any folder on your disk. For instance:
    • c:\development\
  • You will see a PureMVC_Haxe_MultiCore_X_Y (where X_Y is version) source folder. For instance:
c:\development\PureMVC_Haxe_MultiCore_X_Y From the Repository
  • Use your favorite SVN client to retrieve the latest source code release from the repository.
